author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...TROPICAL STORM KRISTY HEADING WESTWARD AND STRENGTHENING...
summary:
...TROPICAL STORM KRISTY HEADING WESTWARD AND STRENGTHENING...
 As of 9:00 PM CST Mon Oct 21
 the center of Kristy was located near 13.7, -103.3
 with movement W at 16 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 1003 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.
